Package display

Class BtnListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • display.BtnListener
  • public class BtnListener
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows to create listener and event when a button is clicked
    Version:
    1.0.0

        action - - The action required by the user
        mf - - The menuFrame where errors will be displayed
        singlePlayer - - true if the game is launch in single player mode or false

        g - - the game to continue if the pawn selected is valid
        p - - the current player
